post.body: haha... that is exactly what i am trying to find
Will do. Yeah, I want to find one where I can scan codes at the store and then get prices.
Any chance you could send me a screenshot? I want to send to the AIR team. (mesh@adobe.com)
Weird. Are you on Mac or Windows?
Adobe AIR is fully supported. Where did you hear otherwise?
You can also check out these resources : http://bit.ly/U0vX
It could still be pretty useful, although I would pick up the Hillegass book : http://bit.ly/N0yb
git tag -a v.85 f2d828bae977b35000507b88ec64d89086bad205gi
Yeah. I will after I have played with it for a couple of days. I like it thus far.
Here is the update for cs4 and AIR 1.5 : http://bit.ly/WwJt
Has you app been approved yet?
Yeah. Ive read about half of it, and and have been building my own app since then. Still planning on finishing it though.
Can you resend ?I dont seem to have received it.
i love the icon
http://flickr.com/photos/mikechambers/3084610973/
Did you email your info to me?
np. Ill twitter when / if I get some info
Im trying to find out right now.
You are.
Yes. We know. Do you have something in particular in mind?
Haha... Thats the first thing I checked (I even referenced your email to find the path)
Yeah. We just tried that out too. It seems to work pretty well.
Yeah. It is driving me crazy too...
Its not a performance issue, it is an AIR bug.
That is awesome! I had never seen that before.
Admin has had a ton of work, but I keep it updated mostly for security reasons.
Yeah. i love that stamp. I had it custom made online
im not a huge porter fan... but ill probably try my hand at one eventually
http://tinyurl.com/6qy4nj
if you receive on in the mail in the next week or two, you will know... ;)
I would like this for Christmas : http://bit.ly/114Jg (oh, and world peas too)
Did it contain the Silverlight SDK? ; )
You should try and sell the box of evil on craigslist...
What is the error?
Dell 2707 wfp : These are great. Highly recomended.
Good luck
http://tinyurl.com/6om7e6
congrats!
kicked me out of their halo game :( I have been shunned...
Where is the notespark API?
Yeah. It is supposed to be easy, but my application got bugged somehow.
No. You cant put them on the top bar.
can you email me at mikechambers@gmail.com?
Did you uninstall the beta version of air first? http://bit.ly/qip7
been playing some Halo and World of Warcraft. Planning a lot of halo over the holidays. Gotta get my leet skillz back...
Not in the browser. You can do it in AIR.
https://dl.getdropbox.com/u/361009/fonts.txt
Yeah. The issue is I have no eye for WHICH fonts work from a design / functional standpoint.
Have you tried it on XP64?
That is what i like to hear!
When you figure out where to put the new flash eboy stickers, send me a picture.
there are layoffs pretty much everywhere (or will be)
Yeah, i figured the 5 second rule also applies to beer.
Yeah. I downloaded the trial but it doesnt work with my webcam (logitech)
Yeah. That thing is awesome. But I want to try delicious monster before I shell out $300 for the scanner!
can you send me a description of the issue to mesh@adobe.com and ill pass it on to the air team
Yeah. I already have an idea for a level.
I cant do those type of games on console. We should get together soon and play some on PC.
Can anyone recomend a good barcode reader / scanner app for iphone?
Man, typepad has the worst UI and user interaction workflows.
Have you had any issues with Adobe AIR 1.5? : http://bit.ly/yMmK
Grap. Just found out that Comcast discontinued their usenet access.
Btw, if anyone is interested, here is my other, much more (kind of scary) nerdy weblog : http://mesh.typepad.com/
fyi : Just released a Cocoa / Mac app I have been working on : http://bit.ly/9LkR (For finding Shortwave Radio Broadcasts)
That should be : git push --tags
Found it : get push --tags
Anyone know how to push a tag using git?I created a tag, but when I do "git push" nothing happens
playing some halo
Just made a post about the recent changes at adobe : http://bit.ly/uET6
working on a blog post about the changes announced yesterday...
Just a quick clarification, but I am still with Adobe (there has been some confusion around that)
About to head up to the office in San Francisco. Going to be a little odd today
Im really starting to grok Cocoa.
About to watch the SEC title game. Go Gators!
Just addressed my 100th envelope of the day.
The AS3 RIA Guide appears to be really popular in Aquascalientes Mexico
Heading out for an our or two for a doctors appointment
Have addressed 77 envelopes thus far this morning.
RT @TweetDeck: What do you think of the icon @soska made for TweetDeck? http://bit.ly/LDBX (thxs @soska very cool of you!)
Also make sure to include your country if you are not in US or Canada
If you email me about the RIAguides : MAKE SURE TO INCLUDE YOUR MAILING INFO
Here is the link for the RIA Guide : http://bit.ly/18n3V (Ill throw in sother other goodies too)
I have 200 updated AS3 RIAGuides that I will personally ship out to the first 200 people who email me their mailing info : mesh@adobe.com
Btw, the Anchor Christmas Ale is really tasty this year. Highly recomended. (seems to have some nutmeg and cloves this year).
Safari is crashing all the time now. I wish someone would make a decent browser for mac. Firefox and Safari suck.
Testing out profiling a AIR app with Mac Instruments
About to head down to San Jose...
Anyone want to play some "Halo" tonight? : http://bit.ly/4x4d
RT @peterelst: really impressive entries in the 25-line ActionScript conference -- http://www.25lines.com/?page_id=139
So what is everyone asking Santa (or whomever) for Christmas? Here is my list : http://bit.ly/rbQC
Upgrading blog to Wordpress 2.7. It might be down for a bit.
They are endowed with reason and conscience and should act towards one another in a spirit of brotherhood. : http://bit.ly/9gZM
All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights. : http://bit.ly/9gZM
Trying to figure out the next beer to brew. Bavarian helles or Czech pilsner?
At the doctors getting some blood drawn. It is about as fun as it sounds.
For some reason, I have this song stuck in my head this morning : http://bit.ly/jJj8
Running Lua in the Flash Player (Using Alchemy) : http://bit.ly/11Vqe
RIA Guides Ready to mail : http://bit.ly/9avQ
About to start addressing envelopes again. Still have about 60 to go, and then I send the RIA Guides out.
Really digging the Cocoa Script Bridging Framework : http://bit.ly/IfXG
Just got a Christmas tree...
Its Miller High Life time...
fyi : Here is a screenshot of my cocoa app : http://bit.ly/Ymp3 (showing adding a broadcast to ical).
RoboCop Rap : http://bit.ly/RZHj
I think I finally got my iPhone developer program application sorted out.
If you are OK with installing pre-release software, then you should be OK with reading release notes before installing the release version.
Trying to figure out the best way to archive a large set of default data for an iPhone app? CSV? XML? NSKeyedArchiver?
Scratch that last twitter. That was just for the Hard Drive, not entire xbox.
